section.para: To update List Prices by Product Category, select the "Update List Prices by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Update List Prices by Product Category

section.para: When updating List Prices by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to update List Prices for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose List Prices you want to update.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Update your List Prices by a specified percentage for the selected Product Categories.
